title: Are there any people here enrolled in Madras University distance education? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes..!! I have enrolled myself at Madras University Distance education. I have applied fr Masters of Business Managements (MBA) - Marketing management. I have classes on weekends ( Saturday and Sunday). During the lockdown period the conduct online classes through ZOOM software. As per the instruction from the faculty, admission for the year 2020–2022 is open and is available online. For further details contact the official website of madras university. Good luck 🤞
